projects.description: A Fullstack Ecommerce WebApp developed from scratch using the MERN stack. Features a minimal, responsive and performant UI developed with MUI, a robust API to handle inventory and customers created in ExpressJS, Razorpay integration to handle payments, along with a custom CMS solution

A webapp to search, shop, explore and keep track of deals on your favourite games across different stores. Developed using the MERN stack, GameTrakr features a functional, responsive UI created using vanilla CSS, custom auth solutions created in expressJS
